Reference

Data visualisation

Create USSC-themed graphs in ggplot2 and r2d3

Fill scale constructor for USSC colours

Main USSC theme

Dark USSC theme

Function to extract USSC colours as hex codes

Function to extract USSC colours as hex codes

USSC colours

plot_ussc_logo()

Append new USSC logo at the bottom of graph

USSC palettes

ussc_palettes()

Return function to interpolate a ussc colour palette
